#summary &udblac; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &udblac;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Udblac;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0170/index.htm U+00170].
  * `&udblac;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0171/index.htm U+00171].
